creator: CodeWarrior@csi.com
text:
When I upgraded from Ant 1.4.1 to 1.5, the <junit> task won't work???  Even 
something as simple as:

    <junit>
    </junit>

causes an error.  

However, when I reverted back to 1.4.1, everything worked fine.

A copy of my build.xml is available upon request.

Daniel Carda

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Does the error says 'please provide more information such as detailed error 
and a sample demonstrating the problem' ?
